title: Garmin’s New Edge 1050 is Bigger, Brighter, & Has a Built-In Bike Bell
content:
New features move the Garmin Edge 1050 away from a racing first mindset with a focus on the type of riding more people actually enjoy.

Read the full article at Garmin’s New Edge 1050 is Bigger, Brighter, & Has a Built-In Bike Bell on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
